# SecureStringExtensions class

Static class than contains extension methods for objects of type SecureString.


| --- | --- |
| static [Disposed](SecureStringExtensions/Disposed.md)(…) | Determines whether input secure string is disposed. |
| static [Value](SecureStringExtensions/Value.md)(…) | Returns the value stored in the specified secure string |
